alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 23 at 1:50PM CDT until April 23 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 149 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over northern Lake Traverse Reservation, or 28 miles southwest of Wahpeton, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Hankinson and Stiles around 200 PM CDT. Great Bend around 205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Mantador, Barney, Mooreton and Galchutt. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 40. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
